notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: A. Yoshiasa and K. Sugiyama wrote the main manuscript text. A. Yoshiasa, M. Tokuda, K. Momma, A. Nakatsuka and K. Sugiyama contributed to structure analyses and XANES experiments. M. Misawa and F. Shimojo were in charge of the simulation. R. Miyawaki and S. Matsubara conducted chemical analyses, sample preparation and other experiments.
